burst.msg_body: Sequential read of length 1024 has been inferred
Could not widen since type i8 size is greater than or equal to the max_widen_bitwidth threshold of 0

Multiple burst reads of length 1024 and bit width 8 in loop 'APPEARANCES' has been inferred on bundle 'gmem'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
